title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, voice input).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting, managing models and logs, with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete and embeddings.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that lets you chat with Ollama models inside a buffer, rewrite code, or generate docs.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift package for iOS/macOS apps to integrate local Ollama endpoints via async/await.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform) construct to deploy Ollama on AWS ECS with GPU support in one command.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that exposes Ollama as REST and WebSocket endpoints with actuator metrics.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint with jq parsing examples.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, serde and full endpoint coverage plus examples.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.
